| Type | Description | Link | | ---- | ----------- | ---- | | Break | Remove unnecessary `executor.threads.terminated` metric which can be estimated by subtracting running threads from created threads. The rate that threads terminate is generally less interesting than the rate that they're created because termination most often occurs after some timeout. | https://github.com/palantir/tritium/pull/1230 | | Break | Remove unnecessary executor metrics.

* `executor.completed` is identical to the `count` value of the `executor.duration` timer. Dashboards will need to replace the former with the latter.
* `executor.scheduled.percent-of-period` is unused, our pipeline has filtered out the metric for a while now to reduce bloat.
* Scheduled executors no longer produce `executor.scheduled.once`, `executor.scheduled.repetitively`, or `executor.submitted` because they are not meaningful when some tasks recur. | https://github.com/palantir/tritium/pull/1230 |

| Type | Description | Link | | ---- | ----------- | ---- | | Improvement | Socket handshake metrics are not recorded by default to prevent new threads for each handshake

Metrics and logging can be enabled by either enabling debug logging
on `com.palantir.tritium.metrics.HandshakeInstrumentation` or
by setting the `instrument.tls.socket` property to `true`. | https://github.com/palantir/tritium/pull/792 |

| Type | Description | Link | | ---- | ----------- | ---- | | Improvement | Upgrade CircleCI build to JDK 8u252

Suppress JEP 244 SSLEngine overrides
JEP 244: TLS Application-Layer Protocol Negotiation Extension was backported to JDK8u251+ per https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8230977 which added 4 methods that were previously only in JDK9+.

Unfortunately this causes problems compiling locally when using JDK 8u251+ as error-prone will flag missing `@Override` annotations, so for now going to suppress the missing annotation to allow compilation across multiple different JDK versions without issue. | https://github.com/palantir/tritium/pull/781 | | Improvement | Remove Checkstyle guava version override | https://github.com/palantir/tritium/pull/788 | | Improvement | Add `instrument.tls.socket` property to disable handshake metrics using sockets | https://github.com/palantir/tritium/pull/790 |

). | https://github.com/palantir/tritium/pull/689 | | Improvement | Migrate class loading gauges to metric-schema | https://github.com/palantir/tritium/pull/690 | | Improvement | Migrate JVM thread gauges to metric-schema for more thorough generated documentation. | https://github.com/palantir/tritium/pull/697 | | Improvement | Implement a tagged instrumented ThreadFactory | https://github.com/palantir/tritium/pull/698 |

name: Tritium 0.15.0
body: * [feature] Add new `tritium-metrics-jvm` module with standard JVM instrumentation (#308)

name: Tritium 0.14.0
body:
* [feature] Implement tagged GC metrics (#296)
* [feature] Add Tagged Memory Pool Metrics (#297)
* [improvement] Upgrade tracing-java to take advantage of low-garbage fastStartSpan (#291)
* [improvement] Upgrade slf4j to 1.7.26 (#294)
* [fix] Remove unnecessary non-ascii JavaDoc (#276)
* [fix] Declare metrics-core as gradle `api` dependency (#275)

name: Tritium 0.13.0
body: * [break] Fix MetricName comparator for tags (#272)

name: Tritium 0.12.5
body:
* Add tagged cache metrics (#268)

For Guava caches:
`MetricRegistries#registerCache(TaggedMetricRegistry, Cache<?,?>, SafeArg<java.lang.String>)`

For Caffeine caches:
`CaffeineCacheStats#registerCache(TaggedMetricRegistry, Cache<?,?>, SafeArg<java.lang.String>)`

For each registered cache, produces tag name `cache` with tag value of specified `SafeArg`'s value, and all of the following metrics (assuming the relevant cache has `recordStats()` enabled)
```
"cache.estimated.size"
"cache.maximum.size"
"cache.weighted.size"
"cache.request.count"
"cache.hit.count"
"cache.hit.ratio"
"cache.miss.count"
"cache.miss.ratio"
"cache.eviction.count"
"cache.load.success.count"
"cache.load.failure.count"
"cache.load.average.millis"
```

name: Tritium 0.12.4
body:
Upgrades dependencies:
* Jackson 2.9.9
* tracing-java 2.14.0 (defaults to 1% random sampler)
- [fix] `MetricRegistries.createWithSlidingTimeWindowReservoirs()` counts are monotonic after the window, which is consistent with the tagged registry (#260)

name: Tritium 0.12.2
body: * [fix] #256: Log the string value of Metric implementations (#257)

name: Tritium 0.12.1
body: * Update executor `name` tag to `executor`, and handshake `name` tag to `context` to avoid collision with default metric tags (#252)

name: Tritium 0.12.0
body:
* TLS Handshake Instrumentation (#246)
* [break] Only one 'default' TaggedMetricRegistry (#249)

The default `TaggedMetricRegistry` is not backed by [`SlidingTimeWindowArrayReservoir` 35 second window](https://metrics.dropwizard.io/3.2.3/apidocs/com/codahale/metrics/SlidingTimeWindowArrayReservoir.html)

name: Tritium 0.11.10
body:
* Added support for creating a SlidingTimeWindowArrayReservoir metric registry (#238)
* Avoid potential deadlock copying system properties (#245)

name: Tritium 0.11.9
body:
* Add instrumented executors (#231)
* Remove unnecessary unchecked suppressions from MetricRegistries.java (#234)

name: Tritium 0.11.8
body:
* Enable safe logging preconditions (#211)
* More error prone checks, cleanup, and improved test coverage (#212)
* JIT all the things (#213)
* Fix timestamp parsing test flakes (#221)
* Excavator: Upgrade dependencies (#214 #216 #218 #219 #222 #224 #225 #226)

name: Tritium 0.11.7
body: * Avoid logging method arguments (#210)

name: Tritium 0.11.6
body:
* Exclude method arguments from invocation context toString() (#209)
* Upgrade to gradle 5.3
* Upgrade dependencies

name: Tritium 0.11.5
body:
* fix: Add the type parameter to gauge in TaggedMetricRegistry (#191)
* Upgrade to gradle 5.2.1
* Upgrade dependencies
```
com.github.ben-manes.caffeine:caffeine = 2.7.0
com.google.errorprone:error_prone_annotations = 2.3.3
com.google.errorprone:error_prone_core = 2.3.3
com.palantir.safe-logging:* = 1.8.2
com.palantir.tracing:* = 2.6.1
org.assertj:assertj-core = 3.12.0
org.mockito:mockito-core = 2.24.5
```

name: Tritium 0.11.4
body:
Upgrade dependencies
* com.palantir.safe-logging:* = 1.8.1
* com.palantir.tracing:* = 2.3.0

name: Tritium 0.11.3
body:
* Fix NPE with tagged metrics instrumentation (#153)
* Upgrade dependencies
    * `com.fasterxml.jackson.*:* = 2.9.8`
    * `com.palantir.safe-logging:* = 1.8.0`
    * `com.uber.nullaway:nullaway = 0.6.4`
    * `org.hdrhistogram:* = 2.1.11`
    * `org.immutables:* = 2.7.5`

name: Tritium 0.11.0
body:
Migrate from remoting3 to tracing-java (#100)
* Remove remoting3 dependency and pick up rebranded tracing-java change. If tracing-java is not available on classpath, tritium will fall back to using remoting3 if available via reflection.

name: Tritium 0.10.3
body: * Make publish depend on bintrayUpload (#94)

name: Tritium 0.10.2
body:
* Add metric for maximum size and weighted size of cache (#93)
* Excavator: Render CircleCI file using template specified in .circleci/template.sh (#91)
* Excavator: Upgrades gradle wrapper to the latest version (#92)
* Implement toString for InvocationEventProxy (#90)
* Cleanup java-library gradle dependency definitions (#89)
* Upgrade gradle build infrastructure dependencies (#88)
* Move testArtifacts to tritium-test (#87)
* Upgrade to CircleCI 2.0 (#82)

name: Tritium 0.10.1
body:
* TaggedMetricRegistry composability (#81)
    * Frequently libraries produce metrics, but the context of usage is not known (e.g. Atlas metrics are coupled to an Atlas client, Spark metrics are tied to a job). In this case, if a caller has multiple metric registries, they can add the child metrics to the parent with a tag, so that they can be distinguished.
* Upgrades gradle wrapper to the latest version (#79)
* Update bintray plugin to fix Gradle 4.8 incompatibility (#80)

name: Tritium 0.10.0
body:
[BREAKING] Support providing a Supplier for `TaggedMetricRegistry`
* Implementations of `TaggedMetricRegistry` will need to implement additional` methods to support a registering a metric with a metric supplier.

name: Tritium 0.9.1
body:
* Upgrade buildscript dependencies (#72)
* Apply gradle-circle-style for improved CircleCI Checkstyle errors (#73)
* Upgrades gradle wrapper to the latest version (#74)
* Upgrades Baseline to the latest version (#75)
* Remove findbugs (#76)
    * Remove 'com.google.code.findbugs:annotations' compile dependency

name: Tritium 0.9.0
body:
The main change is additive API to support removing tagged metrics.

* Apply gradle-circle-style for improved CircleCI Checkstyle errors (#65)
* Upgrades gradle wrapper to 4.3.1 (#66)
* Upgrades Baseline to 0.17.1 (#62)
* Upgrade buildscript dependencies (#64)
* Upgrades gradle wrapper to the latest version (#67)
* JavaDoc TaggedMetricRegistry API (#69)
* Support Removing tagged metrics (#68)
* Add build reports to Circle test reports (#70)

name: Tritium 0.8.5
body: Set of standard tag names/values (#60)

name: Tritium 0.8.4
body:
Update Remoting3 (#58)
* Update Remoting3 minimum to 3.5.1
* Exclude duplicate dependencies from HdrHistogram metrics reservoir
* Improve Maven publishing via Gradle Nebula plugins
    * Publish BOM for tritium-lib and tritium-metrics modules to simplify transitive dependency versioning.
* Publish JavaDoc by default
* Upgrade to Gradle 4.2.1

name: Tritium 0.8.3
body:
Bridge to back compatibility (#57)
* Introduce bridge method to maintain compatibility for `com.palantir.tritium.proxy.Instrumentation$Builder.withLogging(Lorg/slf4j/Logger;Lcom/palantir/tritium/event/log/LoggingLevel;Lcom/palantir/tritium/api/functions/LongPredicate;)Lcom/palantir/tritium/proxy/Instrumentation$Builder;`

name: Tritium 0.8.2
body:
Fix additional backward compatibility breaks (#56)
* Restore types on `LoggingInvocationEventHandler` constants to `com.palantir.tritium.api.functions.LongPredicate`
* Add explicit backward compatibility bridge constructors to `AbstractInvocationEventHandler` and `LoggingInvocationEventHandler`

name: Tritium 0.8.1
body:
Restore API backward compatibility (#55)
* Moves InvocationContext and InvocationEventHandler back to com.palantir.tritium.event package to maintain backward compatibility.

name: Tritium 0.8.0
body:
* [breaking] Convert TaggedMetricRegistry to interface (#53)

Migrate `TaggedMetricRegistry` to interface and `tritium-registry` module with reduced dependencies.

`com.palantir.tritium.metrics.TaggedMetricRegistry` is now an interface and moved to `com.palantir.tritium.metrics.registry.TaggedMetricRegistry` with default implementation `com.palantir.tritium.metrics.registry.DefaultTaggedMetricRegistry`.

name: Tritium 0.7.0
body:
Tritium 0.7.0

* [breaking] Upgrade all modules to Java 8 source and compilation (#22)
* [breaking] Cleanup API interfaces (#24)
    * Move following classes from com.palantir.tritium.event to com.palantir.tritium.api.event
        * InstrumentationFilter
        * InvocationContext
        * InvocationEventHandler
* Move Proxies to tritium-proxy module (#25)
* Add safe-logging SafeArg to relevant logging statements (#23)
* Make registerSafe more threadsafe. (#26)
* Upgrade Dropwizard Metrics to 3.1.5 (#27)
* Setup circle test summary (#31)
* Upgrade build infrastructure and gradle 4.2 (#32)
* Add MetricRegistries metricsPrefixedBy and metricsMatching (#30)
* Metric grouping via @MetricGroup annotation (#33)
* Apply Nebula maven resolved dependencies plugin (#34)
* Use assertj for tests (#36)
* Dependency cleanup (#41)
    * Upgrade safe-logging to 0.1.3
    * Upgrade Dropwizard metrics-core to 3.2.5
    * Upgrade HdrHistogram to 2.1.10
* Cleanup TestClock (#43)
* Remove existing cache metrics when registering new cache with same name (#44)
* Enable tracing for Tritium.instrument (#46)
* Cache system properties for enabling/disabling instrumentation (#49)
* Use Java 8 java.util.function.* (#50)
* Add a TaggedMetricRegistry (#51)

name: Tritium 0.7.0-beta5
body:
Changes since 0.7.0-beta4:

* Cleanup TestClock (#43)
* Remove existing cache metrics when registering new cache with same name (#44)
* Disallow uppercase tag names (#45)
* Enable tracing for Tritium.instrument (#46)
* Cache system properties for enabling/disabling instrumentation (#49)
* Use Java 8 java.util.function.* (#50)
* Add a TaggedMetricRegistry (#51)

name: Tritium 0.7.0-beta4
body:
Changes since 0.7.0-beta3

* Make TaggedMetric getters public (#42)

name: Tritium 0.7.0-beta3
body:
Changes since 0.7.0-beta2

* Use assertj for tests (#36)
* Create tritium-tags module (#39)
    * Add `TaggedMetric` class to handle generating canonical metric name including tags via `String toCanonicalName(String name, Map<String, String> tags)`, and parse via `TaggedMetric from(String canonicalName)`
    * Tag names are normalized to lower case, permitting up to 20 character alpha-numeric and optional hyphens.
* Dependency cleanup (#41)
    * Add tritium-tags to tritium-metrics as dependency
    * Upgrade safe-logging to 0.1.3
    * Upgrade Dropwizard metrics-core to 3.2.5
    * Upgrade HdrHistogram to 2.1.10

name: Tritium 0.7.0-beta2
body:
Changes since 0.7.0-beta1
* Metric grouping via @MetricGroup annotation (#33)
* Apply Nebula maven resolved dependencies plugin (#34)

name: Tritium 0.7.0-beta1
body:

* [breaking] Upgrade all modules to Java 8 source and compilation (#22)
* [breaking] Cleanup API interfaces (#24)
    * Move following classes from com.palantir.tritium.event to com.palantir.tritium.api.event
        * InstrumentationFilter
        * InvocationContext
        * InvocationEventHandler
* Move Proxies to tritium-proxy module (#25)

* Add safe-logging SafeArg to relevant logging statements (#23)
* Make registerSafe more threadsafe. (#26)
* Upgrade Dropwizard Metrics to 3.1.5 (#27)
* Setup circle test summary (#31)
* Upgrade build infrastructure and gradle 4.2 (#32)
* Add MetricRegistries metricsPrefixedBy and metricsMatching (#30)

name: Tritium 0.6.1
body: * Optimize hot paths for JIT compilation (#9)
